au.edu.uts.eng.remotelabs.rigclient.util

Class AbstractLog4JLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.edu.uts.eng.remotelabs.rigclient.util.AbstractLogger
      • au.edu.uts.eng.remotelabs.rigclient.util.AbstractLog4JLogger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILogger
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FileLogger, RolledFileLogger, SyslogLogger, WinEventsLogger

    abstract class AbstractLog4JLogger
extends AbstractLogger
    Apache Log4j abstract logger. Sub-classes implement the setAppender to set where Log4J logs to.
